title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.8 - Signing, filing of decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.8 - Signing, filing of decision

State Regulations

The decision shall be signed by the members of the hospital
arbitration committee making the decision and shall be filed with the secretary
of the board, and notice of the decision shall be mailed to the hospital and to
the carrier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
327.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
